title: If a Gromp in the jungle falls off its lilly pad
body: And there's nobody there.. Does it still make a sound ?

replies.body: I....well....I don't know.
Gromp is easily the most loved neutral creature of all time... I say we give him a ward skin!

# TeamGromp, Season 69, the world champions

I'm throwing it out there

> [{quoted}](name=Quort,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=b5Vop4hb,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-02-10T01:21:12.986+0000)
>
> Gromp is easily the most loved neutral creature of all time... I say we give him a ward skin!

For all you Gromp fans, take a moment and learn about the Gromp (Spoiler Warning: There is no information on lily pads, but some on mushrooms):

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/6GInAv8w-gromp-journal-entry
I personally like the Chickens more. :3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=b5Vop4hb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-09T22:53:18.580+0000)
>
> I....well....I don't know.

I am so dissappoint.
I thought you knew stuff!!!
Well, does it make any sounds if you're near? If gromp is 100% silent about it, then there's no question. He doesn't anywhere if he doesn't with you there.

the answer to this question depends on how one defines sound. If sound is merely the particular wavelengths produced by the collision of 2 objects and then propagated through the medium we call air, then yes, a sound was produced.

but if you define something as a sound only when it is registered by the human brain then the question is redundant due to no humans being present.
Only if you can see it  =P
League logic: Seeing is hearing {{summoner:2}} {{item:3363}}

It's amazing, isn't it? You can stand in a bush 2 feet from someone and laugh your head off, and they can't hear you. But walk out of the bush, far enough that you can barely see them, and they can hear you just fine.

>
> League logic: Seeing is hearing {{summoner:2}} {{item:3363}}

So Lee Sin is not only blind, but also deaf?
then how does lee's soundwave q work hm?
I assume he makes the screaming frog noise until he is flipped over onto his stomach by blue buff  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7Jm_eUQSYAk
wtf is this thread lmfao
If Maokai gets executed by a turret, and there's nobody there, does he still make a sound?

>

lol
Yes it does.
EXECUTED.
Touche :)

No, because Gromp doesn't have a lilly pad, he has a mushroom. And I'm pretty sure jungle monsters don't have animations when there's no players watching. Do you even play league, or are you just looking for upvotes kappa?

>

Don't be a jackass.
it does if you left a ward so you can watch it on a replay.

Well, I don't know about that...

But if you want an actual Gromp fact, their goo melts clothing.

Pervy frogs.
I'm getting a naruto vibe from this......
but its a mushroom...
Matters if your team has wards or not.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/If_a_tree_falls_in_a_forest (replace the word "tree" in the article with gromp, and "forest" as lilly pads)
